headline.main: RUSSIANS SMASH ON; Fuehrer Flies to Check Spread of Nazi 'Rout,' Swedes Hear STARITSA IS RETAKEN Assault on Mozhaisk Also Widens Menace to Smolensk Zone RUSSIANS DRIVE ON; HITLER ALARM SEEN

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Friday, Jan. 2 -- Coincident with Russian declarations that the Red Army was pursuing an enemy "at the end of his resistance," it was reported from Stockholm late yesterday that Reichsfuehrer Hitler had left Berchtesgaden for the Eastern Front to take personal charge of the German operations.
